original_text: So when the decree made by the king is proclaimed throughout all his kingdom, for it is vast, all women will give honor to their husbands, high and low alike.”
korean_text: 왕의 조서가 이 광대한 전국에 반포되면 귀천을 막론하고 모든 여인들이 그들의 남편을 존경하리이다 하니라

sentences.original_text: So when the decree made by the king
is proclaimed throughout all his kingdom,
all women will give honor to their husbands,
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 여인들은 자기 남편에게 존경을 표하게 될 것입니다,
높은 사람이나 낮은 사람이나 모두 다.
